topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Trust Wallet reported a security breach affecting its Chrome browser extension (version 2.68.0), resulting in approximately $7 million in user funds being drained. The team is investigating how a malicious version was submitted, while confirming that affected user funds will be covered.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/902926941413453824/status/2004397190819783013
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28257759/Trust-Wallet-Hack-Today-Who-Is-at-Risk-After-6-Million-Breach
- https://twitter.com/1165106855879704577/status/2004537536002359784
